segments.source_content: This plugin creates sitemaps for your site so that search engine crawlers can crawl your site more accurately.

translations.zh-hant: 此插件會為您的網站生成站點地圖，使搜索引擎爬蟲能更精確地爬取您的網站內容。

segments.source_content:
:::warning[production only]

This plugin is always inactive in development and **only active in production** because it works on the build output.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning[僅限生產環境]

此插件在開發環境中始終處於非活躍狀態，且**僅在生產環境生效**（執行`docusaurus build`時），因為它需要基於構建輸出結果運作。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::tip

If you use the preset `@docusaurus/preset-classic`, you don't need to install this plugin as a dependency.

You can configure this plugin through the [preset options](../../using-plugins.mdx#docusauruspreset-classic).

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

若您使用預設配置`@docusaurus/preset-classic`，則無需額外安裝此插件作為依賴項。

您可透過[預設選項](../../using-plugins.mdx#docusauruspreset-classic)來配置此插件。

:::

segments.source_content: | Name | Type | Default | Description | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | `lastmod` | `'date' \| 'datetime' \| null` | `null` | `date` is YYYY-MM-DD. `datetime` is a ISO 8601 datetime. `null` is disabled. See [sitemap docs](https://www.sitemaps.org/protocol.html#xmlTagDefinitions). | | `changefreq` | `string \| null` | `'weekly'` | See [sitemap docs](https://www.sitemaps.org/protocol.html#xmlTagDefinitions) | | `priority` | `number \| null` | `0.5` | See [sitemap docs](https://www.sitemaps.org/protocol.html#xmlTagDefinitions) | | `ignorePatterns` | `string[]` | `[]` | A list of glob patterns; matching route paths will be filtered from the sitemap. Note that you may need to include the base URL in here. | | `filename` | `string` | `sitemap.xml` | The path to the created sitemap file, relative to the output directory. Useful if you have two plugin instances outputting two files. | | `createSitemapItems` | [CreateSitemapItemsFn](#CreateSitemapItemsFn) \| undefined | `undefined` | An optional function which can be used to transform and / or filter the items in the sitemap. |

:::info

This plugin also respects some site config:

- [`noIndex`](../docusaurus.config.js.mdx#noIndex): results in no sitemap generated
- [`trailingSlash`](../docusaurus.config.js.mdx#trailingSlash): determines if the URLs in the sitemap have trailing slashes

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info

此插件同時遵循以下站點配置：

- [`noIndex`](../docusaurus.config.js.mdx#noIndex)：若啟用則不會生成站點地圖
- [`trailingSlash`](../docusaurus.config.js.mdx#trailingSlash)：決定站點地圖中的URL是否包含尾部斜杠

:::

segments.source_content:
:::note[About `lastmod`]

The `lastmod` option will only output a sitemap `<lastmod>` tag if plugins provide [route metadata](../plugin-methods/lifecycle-apis.mdx#addRoute) attributes `sourceFilePath` and/or `lastUpdatedAt`.

All the official content plugins provide the metadata for routes backed by a content file (Markdown, MDX or React page components), but it is possible third-party plugin authors do not provide this information, and the plugin will not be able to output a `<lastmod>` tag for their routes.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note[關於`lastmod`]

`lastmod`選項僅在插件提供[路由元數據](../plugin-methods/lifecycle-apis.mdx#addRoute)屬性`sourceFilePath`和/或`lastUpdatedAt`時，才會輸出站點地圖的`<lastmod>`標籤。

所有官方內容插件都會為基於內容文件（Markdown、MDX或React頁面組件）的路由提供元數據，但第三方插件作者可能未提供此信息，此時插件將無法為其路由輸出`<lastmod>`標籤。

:::

segments.source_content: You can configure this plugin through preset options or plugin options.

translations.zh-hant: 您可透過預設選項或插件選項來配置此插件。

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Most Docusaurus users configure this plugin through the preset options.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

多數Docusaurus用戶透過預設選項配置此插件。

:::

segments.source_content: You can find your sitemap at `/sitemap.xml`.

translations.zh-hant: 您可在`/sitemap.xml`路徑找到生成的站點地圖。
